amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore $170 million to Army Operations & Maintenance (O&M) for the purpose of preventing a cut to depots and the Organic Industrial Base (OIB), offset with funds from Operations & Maintenance Defense-Wide and non-critical environmental restoration accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 306).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Shuster.
